Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class part of my Star trek adventure game the game is a very simple, text based adventure game with a graphical representation The game has been extended from "SoC World" to be made more interesting! A class to represent an adventurer playing the exciting game of "Soc World". A player has a location (of class Room) and is facing a particular direction.
    Version:
    Final
    Author:
    UP730691

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Construct a player with "null" location facing east
